q1.description: Joint angle 1 of the robot (in radians)

q2.description: Joint angle 2 of the robot (in radians)

q3.description: Joint angle 3 of the robot (in radians)

q4.description: Joint angle 4 of the robot (in radians)

q5.description: Joint angle 5 of the robot (in radians)

q6.description: Joint angle 6 of the robot (in radians)

x.description: X-coordinate of the end effector position (in meters)

y.description: Y-coordinate of the end effector position (in meters)

z.description: Z-coordinate of the end effector position (in meters)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in robot kinematics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the joint angles q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, and q6, please predict the x-coordinate of the robot end-effector.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted x-coordinate of the robot end-effector is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in robot kinematics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the joint angles q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, and q6, please predict the y-coordinate of the robot end-effector.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted y-coordinate of the robot end-effector is: .

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in robot kinematics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the joint angles q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, and q6, please predict the z-coordinate of the robot end-effector.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted z-coordinate of the robot end-effector is: .
